Title: Love and Shukla
Writer: Amanda Mooney, Naseem Shah (additional dialogue), Jatla Siddartha
Actors: Saharsh Kumar Shukla, Taneea Rajawat, Hima Singh, Aparna Upadhyay
Plot: Shukla, an auto driver from an orthodox Brahmin family, has never intimately known a woman other than the celluloid starlets he watches every day on the 4 inch display of his mobile phone.
